Author: melly_the_elephant
Text: This is 100% me. My body holds so much water in shark week that I can feel the bloating in my neck and arms and everywhere! It's disgusting. Same as you that I end up on the toilet weeing like a horse once it's done.  My cravings and urges to binge get SO much stronger in the few days leading up to it. I hate that my body does so much without my control.
